snippet: A 6-year-old cancer patient has been taken from his mother's custody after she refused to take him to a hospital for chemotherapy.   The mother, Elena Duarte, 27, wanted to continue herbal treatments for son, Adrian Chavez, and had threatened to r...
lead_paragraph: A 6-year-old cancer patient has been taken from his mother's custody after she refused to take him to a hospital for chemotherapy. The mother, Elena Duarte, 27, wanted to continue herbal treatments for son, Adrian Chavez, and had threatened to run away with the child, the boy's grandfather said.

headline.main: Boy With Cancer Taken From His Mother
